response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? gibt es wirklich keine gesetze, die uns vor diesem diebstahl schützen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation:

"why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? are there really no laws that protect us from this theft? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post criticizes the fact that companies are still able to collect and sell personal data without proper regulations or protection for individuals. it questions the lack of effective laws and regulations in place to safeguard personal information and privacy. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and spark a discussion on the topic.
